content.text: WargaBantuWarga.com, a site that collects important information about Covid-19. WargaBantuWarga.com provides information related to Covid-19, food assistance, donations to affected residents, including the availability of beds and a list of referral hospitals, as well as locations for filling oxygen cylinders.
